availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Born in 1809. Married to Rebecca Coil December 22, 1833. Member of Kentucky House of Representatives from 1855-7.

bibl.p: Lewis Collins, Collinsâ€™ Historical Sketches of Kentucky. History of Kentucky (Covington: Collins & Co., 1874); "Kentucky, County Marriages, 1797-1954," database with images, FamilySearch (https://familysearch.org/ark:/61903/1:1:F475-9VM : accessed 11 January 2017), Thos. H Corbett and Rebeca Coil, 22 Dec 1833; citing , Ballard, Kentucky, United States, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond; FHL microfilm 25.
